titleStmt.title: An oration spoken in the grammar-school of Christ's-Hospital before the right honourable the Lord Mayor, the right worshipful the presidents, the treasurers, and the rest of the worshipful governours of the hospitals of the renowned city of London, Sept. 21, 1675.
titleStmt.author: Long, Benjamin.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
